title: Bayesian spatio-temporal disease mapping of COVID-19 ...
summary: This article applies spatio-temporal Poisson ANOVA model (SPAM) for Bayesian spatio-temporal disease mapping of COVID-19, focusing on examining variations and interactions in space and time to understand disease patterns.
usefulness_reason: Score 90 assigned because the article directly discusses "Spatio-temporal Poisson ANOVA model" and "spatio-temporal analysis" to understand disease patterns, which is highly relevant to "Spatio Temporal Point Process" and "Spatio Temporal".
